name: Dream Wraith
description: The Dream Wraith is a malevolent, incorporeal creature that preys on the living, characterized by its ability to fly and move through solid objects.
memorable: It can create wraiths from the fallen and manipulate dreams to terrify its foes.
goals: To prey on the living by exploiting their dreams and fears.
relations: It may control undead wraiths it creates.
environment: Thrives in darkness, typically found in eerie or haunted locations.
strengths: High Dexterity for agility in combat and good stealth skills.
attacks: Uses a Sleep Touch attack causing psychic damage and the potential to render targets unconscious.
most_powerful_ability: Steal Dreams allows it to reduce a target to 0 hit points and gain temporary hit points.
senses: Has darkvision allowing it to see in darkness effectively.
skills: Possesses exceptional stealth capabilities with a +7 modifier.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage.
Resistant to multiple damage types including acid and cold.
Can generate illusions of loved ones to terrify foes.
Endures force damage if ending its turn inside solid objects.
Sensitized to sunlight, suffering disadvantages while exposed.
test_queries: creature that preys on sleeping targets
undead that creates wraiths from kills
